Basic.name: Animal Companion
Basic.flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

Basic.name: Arcane Intellect
Basic.flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

Basic.name: Charge
Basic.text: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack and Charge.
Basic.flavor: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

Basic.name: Dalaran Mage
Basic.flavor: You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

Basic.name: Drain Life
Basic.text: Deal $2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero.
Basic.flavor: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

Basic.name: Fan of Knives
Basic.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw a card.
Basic.flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

Basic.name: Frost Nova
Basic.flavor: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

Basic.name: Healing Touch
Basic.flavor: 8 Health, no waiting.

Basic.name: Hex
Basic.text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
Basic.flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

Basic.name: Ironforge Rifleman
Basic.flavor: "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

Basic.name: Ironfur Grizzly
Basic.flavor: "Bear Carcass 1/10"

Basic.name: Kill Command
Basic.text: Deal $3 damage. If you have a Beast, deal $5 damage instead.
Basic.flavor: "Kill!", he commanded.

Basic.name: Magma Rager
Basic.flavor: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

Basic.name: Raid Leader
Basic.flavor: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

Basic.name: Razorfen Hunter
Basic.flavor: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once.  ONCE.

Basic.name: Savage Roar
Basic.text: Give your characters +2 Attack this turn.
Basic.flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

Basic.name: Shadow Bolt
Basic.flavor: It’s a Bolt.   It's made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

Basic.name: Shadow Word: Death
Basic.text: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 5 or more.
Basic.flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

Basic.name: Shattered Sun Cleric
Basic.flavor: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink™!

Basic.name: Shield Block
Basic.flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

Basic.name: Silverback Patriarch
Basic.flavor: He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

Basic.name: Warsong Commander
Basic.flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

Basic.name: Wolfrider
Basic.flavor: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

Classic.name: Acolyte of Pain
Classic.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, draw a card.
Classic.flavor: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

Classic.name: Alarm-o-Bot
Classic.text: At the start of your turn, swap this minion with a random one in your hand.
Classic.flavor: WARNING.  WARNING.  WARNING.

Classic.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
Classic.text: Battlecry: Change an enemy minion's Attack to 1.
Classic.flavor: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

Classic.name: Arcane Golem
Classic.text: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
Classic.flavor: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.

Classic.name: Blood Knight
Classic.text: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.
Classic.flavor: The Blood Knights get their holy powers from the Sunwell, which you should NOT bathe in.

Classic.name: Coldlight Oracle
Classic.text: Battlecry: Each player draws 2 cards.
Classic.flavor: They can see the future.   In that future both players draw more cards.   Spoooky.

Classic.name: Coldlight Seer
Classic.text: Battlecry: Give ALL other Murlocs +2 Health.
Classic.flavor: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths.  So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

Classic.name: Counterspell
Classic.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
Classic.flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

Classic.name: Deadly Shot
Classic.text: Destroy a random enemy minion.
Classic.flavor: Accuracy is not a highly valued trait among the mok'nathal.  Deadliness is near the top, though.

Classic.name: Demolisher
Classic.text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Classic.flavor: Laying siege isn't fun for anyone.  It's not even all that effective, now that everyone has a flying mount.

Classic.name: Divine Favor
Classic.text: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.
Classic.flavor: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!

Classic.name: Eaglehorn Bow
Classic.text: Whenever a friendly Secret is revealed, gain +1 Durability.
Classic.flavor: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

Classic.name: Earthen Ring Farseer
Classic.text: Battlecry: Restore 3 Health.
Classic.flavor: He can see really far, and he doesn't use a telescope like those filthy pirates.

Classic.name: Edwin VanCleef
Classic.text: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each card played earlier this turn.
Classic.flavor: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

Classic.name: Emperor Cobra
Classic.text: Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.
Classic.flavor: The Sholazar Basin is home to a lot of really horrible things. If you're going to visit, wear bug spray.  And plate armor.

Classic.name: Far Sight
Classic.text: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
Classic.flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

Classic.name: Felguard
Classic.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
Classic.flavor: Yes, he'll fight for you.  BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

Classic.name: Feral Spirit
Classic.text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (2)
Classic.flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

Classic.name: Flesheating Ghoul
Classic.text: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
Classic.flavor: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name.  It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

Classic.name: Frothing Berserker
Classic.text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
Classic.flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

Classic.name: Harvest Golem
Classic.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/1 Damaged Golem.
Classic.flavor: "Overheat threshold exceeded. System failure. Wheat clog in port two. Shutting down."

Classic.name: Headcrack
Classic.text: Deal $2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn.
Classic.flavor: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

Classic.name: Ice Barrier
Classic.text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor.
Classic.flavor: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

Classic.name: Ice Block
Classic.text: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
Classic.flavor: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

Classic.name: Imp Master
Classic.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to this minion and summon a 1/1 Imp.
Classic.flavor: She would enjoy the job a lot more if she just could get the imps to QUIT BITING HER.

Classic.name: Injured Blademaster
Classic.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to HIMSELF.
Classic.flavor: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

Classic.name: Ironbeak Owl
Classic.text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
Classic.flavor: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

Classic.name: Jungle Panther
Classic.text: Stealth
Classic.flavor: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

Classic.name: King Mukla
Classic.text: Battlecry: Give your opponent 2 Bananas.
Classic.flavor: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

Classic.name: Kirin Tor Mage
Classic.text: Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
Classic.flavor: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

Classic.name: Laughing Sister
Classic.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.

Classic.name: Lava Burst
Classic.text: Deal $5 damage. Overload: (2)
Classic.flavor: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

Classic.name: Lightning Storm
Classic.text: Deal $2-$3 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (2)
Classic.flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

Classic.name: Mana Tide Totem
Classic.text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
Classic.flavor: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

Classic.name: Mark of Nature
Classic.text: Choose One - Give a minion +4 Attack; or +4 Health and Taunt.
Classic.flavor: Druids call it the "Mark of Nature."  Everyone else calls it "needing a bath."

Classic.name: Mind Control Tech
Classic.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 4 or more minions, take control of one at random.
Classic.flavor: Mind Control technology is getting better, but that's not saying much.

Classic.name: Mirror Entity
Classic.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
Classic.flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

Classic.name: Murloc Warleader
Classic.text: ALL other Murlocs have +2/+1.
Classic.flavor: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound?  Nope!  Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

Classic.name: Perdition's Blade
Classic.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. Combo: Deal 2 instead.
Classic.flavor: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

Classic.name: Questing Adventurer
Classic.text: Whenever you play a card, gain +1/+1.
Classic.flavor: "Does anyone have some extra Boar Pelts?"

Classic.name: Raging Worgen
Classic.text: Enrage: Windfury and +1 Attack
Classic.flavor: If he's raging now, just wait until he gets nerfed.

Classic.name: Scarlet Crusader
Classic.text: Divine Shield
Classic.flavor: Never wash your whites with a Scarlet Crusader.

Classic.name: Sense Demons
Classic.text: Put 2 random Demons from your deck into your hand.
Classic.flavor: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.

Classic.name: Shadowform
Classic.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage'. If already in Shadowform: 3 damage.
Classic.flavor: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

Classic.name: SI:7 Agent
Classic.text: Combo: Deal 2 damage.
Classic.flavor: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities.  Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

Classic.name: Southsea Captain
Classic.text: Your other Pirates have +1/+1.
Classic.flavor: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat.  He has hat envy.

Classic.name: Spellbender
Classic.text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
Classic.flavor: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

Classic.name: Sword of Justice
Classic.text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1 Durability.
Classic.flavor: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

Classic.name: Tauren Warrior
Classic.text: Taunt. Enrage: +3 Attack
Classic.flavor: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.

Classic.name: Thoughtsteal
Classic.text: Copy 2 cards from your opponent's deck and put them into your hand.
Classic.flavor: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

Classic.name: Thrallmar Farseer
Classic.text: Windfury
Classic.flavor: He's stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he's hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

Classic.name: Tinkmaster Overspark
Classic.text: Battlecry: Transform another random minion into a 5/5 Devilsaur or a 1/1 Squirrel.
Classic.flavor: Tinkmaster Overspark nearly lost his Tinker's license after the Great Ironforge Squirrel Stampede of '09.

Classic.name: Unbound Elemental
Classic.text: Whenever you play a card with Overload, gain +1/+1.
Classic.flavor: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

Classic.name: Unleash the Hounds
Classic.text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
Classic.flavor: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

Classic.name: Vaporize
Classic.text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
Classic.flavor: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

Classic.name: Void Terror
Classic.text: Battlecry: Destroy the minions on either side of this minion and gain their Attack and Health.
Classic.flavor: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

Naxxramas.name: Dancing Swords
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Your opponent draws a card.
Naxxramas.flavor: They like to dance to reggae.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Dark Cultist
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +3 Health.
Naxxramas.flavor: The Cult of the Damned has found it's best not to mention their name when recruiting new cultists.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Deathlord
Naxxramas.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Your opponent puts a minion from their deck into the battlefield.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Duplicate
Naxxramas.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, put 2 copies of it into your hand.
Naxxramas.flavor: The one time when duping cards won't get your account banned!
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Enrage
Naxxramas.text: Give your hero +6 Attack this turn.

Naxxramas.name: Hook
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Put this weapon into your hand.

Naxxramas.name: Hook
Naxxramas.text: Windfury Deathrattle: Put this weapon into your hand.

Naxxramas.name: Lady Blaumeux
Naxxramas.text: Your hero is Immune.

Naxxramas.name: Lady Blaumeux
Naxxramas.text: Your hero is Immune.

Naxxramas.name: Massive Runeblade
Naxxramas.text: Deals double damage to heroes.

Naxxramas.name: Massive Runeblade
Naxxramas.text: Deals double damage to heroes.

Naxxramas.name: Mutating Injection
Naxxramas.text: Give a minion +4/+4 and Taunt.

Naxxramas.name: Runeblade
Naxxramas.text: Has +3 Attack if the other Horsemen are dead.

Naxxramas.name: Runeblade
Naxxramas.text: Has +6 Attack if the other Horsemen are dead.

Naxxramas.name: Shade of Naxxramas
Naxxramas.text: Stealth. At the start of your turn, gain +1/+1.
Naxxramas.flavor: The Shades of Naxxramas hate the living. They even have a slur they use to refer them: Livers.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Sir Zeliek
Naxxramas.text: Your hero is Immune.

Naxxramas.name: Sir Zeliek
Naxxramas.text: Your hero is Immune.

Naxxramas.name: Skeletal Smith
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Destroy your opponent's weapon.

Naxxramas.name: Spectral Warrior
Naxxramas.text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your hero.

Naxxramas.name: Stoneskin Gargoyle
Naxxramas.text: At the start of your turn, restore this minion to full Health.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Thane Korth'azz
Naxxramas.text: Your hero is Immune.

Naxxramas.name: Thane Korth'azz
Naxxramas.text: Your hero is Immune.

Naxxramas.name: Unrelenting Warrior
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Summon a Spectral Warrior for your opponent.

Naxxramas.name: Web Wrap
Naxxramas.text: Hero Power Return a random enemy minion to your opponent's hand.

Naxxramas.name: Worshipper
Naxxramas.text: Your hero has +1 Attack on your turn.

Naxxramas.name: Worshipper
Naxxramas.text: Your hero has +3 Attack on your turn.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Bouncing Blade
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deal $1 damage to a random minion. Repeat until a minion dies.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Only goblins would think this was a good idea. Even they are starting to have their doubts.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Coghammer
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield and Taunt.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: So you ripped this out of a machine, carved some runes on it, stuck it on a handle, and now it's a weapon of great divine power? Seems legit.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Cogmaster's Wrench
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: For tightening cogs and smashin' troggs!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Flying Machine
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Windfury
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: To operate, this contraption needs a hula doll on the dashboard. Otherwise it's just a “falling machine.”

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Gnomeregan Infantry
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Charge Taunt
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The gnomes are valiant and ready to return to their irradiated, poorly ventilated homeland!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Gnomish Experimenter
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. If it's a minion, transform it into a Chicken.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He's legitimately surprised every time he turns himself into a chicken.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Goblin Sapper
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Has +4 Attack while your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He’s not such a binge exploder anymore. These days, he only explodes socially.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Grove Tender
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Choose One - Give each player a Mana Crystal; or Each player draws a card.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Likes: Hiking and the great outdoors. Dislikes: Goblin shredders and sandals. (Can’t find any that fit!).

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Hobgoblin
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever you play a 1-Attack minion, give it +2/+2.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Hobgoblins are meeting next week to discuss union benefits.  First on the list: dental plan.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Illuminator
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, restore 4 Health to your hero.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: "LUMOS!" is not what they yell. What do you think this is, Hogwarts?

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Iron Sensei
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +2/+2.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor:
Mechs like learning from him because he really speaks their language.

0110100001101001

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Lil' Exorcist
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Taunt Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each enemy Deathrattle minion.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Warlocks have the town exorcist on speed dial in case they unleash the wrong demon.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Metaltooth Leaper
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs +2 Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Don't leave them out in the rain. In Un'Goro Crater there is a whole colony of rust-tooth leapers.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Muster for Battle
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Ogre Brute
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Ogres have really terrible short-term chocolate.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Ogre Warmaul
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Powermace
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly Mech +2/+2.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: People assume that shamans control the elements, but really, they have to ask them stuff and the elements are like, "Yeah ok, sure."

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Scarlet Purifier
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions with Deathrattle.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The Scarlet Crusade is doing market research to find out if the "Mauve Crusade" would be better received.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Soot Spewer
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Spell Damage +1
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The inventor of the goblin shredder is involved in several patent disputes with the inventor of the soot spewer.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Spider Tank
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: "What if we put guns on it?" -Fizzblitz, staring at the spider-transportation-machine

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Tinkertown Technician
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, gain +1/+1 and add a Spare Part to your hand.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Won't you take me to... Tinkertown?

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Velen's Chosen
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Give a minion +2/+4 and Spell Damage +1.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Velen wrote a "Lovely Card" for Tyrande with a picture of the Deeprun Tram that said "I Choo-Choo-Choose you!"

Blackrock Mountain.name: Blackwing Technician
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1/+1.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: This is who you go to when your Blackwing needs a tune up. Don't go to a cut rate Blackwing tune up shop!
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Brood Affliction: Black
Blackrock Mountain.text: While this is in your hand, whenever Chromaggus draws a card, he gets another copy of it.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Brood Affliction: Blue
Blackrock Mountain.text: While this is in your hand, Chromaggus' spells cost (3) less.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Brood Affliction: Bronze
Blackrock Mountain.text: While this is in your hand, Chromaggus' minions cost (3) less.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Brood Affliction: Green
Blackrock Mountain.text: While this is in your hand, restore 6 health to your opponent at the start of your turn.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Brood Affliction: Red
Blackrock Mountain.text: While this is in your hand, take 3 damage at the start of your turn.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Demonwrath
Blackrock Mountain.text: Deal $2 damage to all non-Demon minions.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Druid of the Flame
Blackrock Mountain.text: Choose One - Transform into a 5/2 minion; or a 2/5 minion.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Druids who fought too long in Northrend were easily seduced by Ragnaros; a mug of hot chocolate was generally all it took.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Flamewaker
Blackrock Mountain.text: After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they don’t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Imp Gang Boss
Blackrock Mountain.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Living Bomb
Blackrock Mountain.text: Choose an enemy minion. If it lives until your next turn, deal $10 damage to all enemies.

The Grand Tournament.name: Argent Horserider
The Grand Tournament.text: Charge Divine Shield
The Grand Tournament.flavor: His horse's name is Betsy.

The Grand Tournament.name: Bash
The Grand Tournament.text:
Deal $3 damage.
Gain 3 Armor.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice.  It doesn't.

The Grand Tournament.name: Beneath the Grounds
The Grand Tournament.text: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your opponent's deck. When drawn, you summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Can you hold these eggs for just a second?  I promise they're not full of giant enraged undead spider things.

The Grand Tournament.name: Boar
The Grand Tournament.text: Charge

The Grand Tournament.name: Burgle
The Grand Tournament.text: Add 2 random class cards to your hand (from your opponent's class).
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Yoink!

The Grand Tournament.name: Coliseum Manager
The Grand Tournament.text: Inspire: Return this minion to your hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Meets monthly with the gladiators to discuss career goals.

The Grand Tournament.name: Dragonhawk Rider
The Grand Tournament.text: Inspire: Gain Windfury this turn.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Check it out.  You can do barrel rolls on this thing.

The Grand Tournament.name: Dreadscale
The Grand Tournament.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other minions.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Let's be clear about this:  ACIDMAW is the sidekick.

The Grand Tournament.name: Effigy
The Grand Tournament.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a random minion with the same Cost.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Burning man, brah.

The Grand Tournament.name: Elemental Destruction
The Grand Tournament.text: Deal $4-$5 damage to all minions. Overload: (5),
The Grand Tournament.flavor: I'm not a shaman or anything, but isn't Elemental Destruction the opposite of what they want to do?

The Grand Tournament.name: Eydis Darkbane
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: HATES being called "the wonder twins".

The Grand Tournament.name: Fencing Coach
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: The next time you use your Hero Power, it costs (2) less.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Good fencers make good neighbors, right?

The Grand Tournament.name: Fjola Lightbane
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain Divine Shield.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: LOVES being called "the wonder twins".

The Grand Tournament.name: Healing Wave
The Grand Tournament.text: Restore #7 Health. Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, Restore #14 instead.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Favored by shaman who study the art of restoration and healing, this spell would feel smug, if it had feelings.

The Grand Tournament.name: Ice Rager
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He's a lot cooler than Magma Rager.

The Grand Tournament.name: King's Defender
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Taunt, gain +1 Durability.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: "King's Attacker" is a shield.  Funny, huh?

The Grand Tournament.name: Light's Champion
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Silence a Demon.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: When there's something strange (say, a gibbering demon) in your neighborhood, who are you going to call?

The Grand Tournament.name: Master of Ceremonies
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Spell Damage, gain +2/+2.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Goes by "MC ElfyElf".

The Grand Tournament.name: Mulch
The Grand Tournament.text:
Destroy a minion.
Add a random minion to your opponent's hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Is this a noun or a verb?  We will never know.

The Grand Tournament.name: Orgrimmar Aspirant
The Grand Tournament.text: Inspire: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: "Four out of three orcs struggle with math." - Angry Zurge

The Grand Tournament.name: Polymorph: Boar
The Grand Tournament.text: Transform a minion into a 4/2 Boar with Charge.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: It's always Huffer.

The Grand Tournament.name: Powershot
The Grand Tournament.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: pow POW pow

The Grand Tournament.name: Saboteur
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's Hero Power costs (5) more next turn.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Listen all y'all it's a saboteur!

The Grand Tournament.name: Seal of Champions
The Grand Tournament.text: Give a minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: "Arf! Arf! Arf!" - Seal of Champions

The Grand Tournament.name: Shadowfiend
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever you draw a card, reduce its Cost by (1).
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Hopes to be promoted to "Shadowfriend" someday.

The Grand Tournament.name: Shady Dealer
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: If you have a Pirate, gain +1/+1.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: I have great deal for you... for 4 damage to your face!

The Grand Tournament.name: Silent Knight
The Grand Tournament.text: Stealth Divine Shield
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He used to be a librarian.  Old habits die hard.

The Grand Tournament.name: Silver Hand Regent
The Grand Tournament.text: Inspire: Summon a 1/1 Silver Hand Recruit.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The Silver Hand is the best paladin organization.  The Argent Crusaders are super jealous.

The Grand Tournament.name: Spellslinger
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Add a random spell to each player's hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Does he sling spells, or do his spells linger about.  Who can say?

The Grand Tournament.name: Stablemaster
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast Immune this turn.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Takes way better care of her pets than her brother, Unstablemaster.

The Grand Tournament.name: Tuskarr Totemic
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Summon ANY random Totem.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

The Grand Tournament.name: Warhorse Trainer
The Grand Tournament.text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +1 Attack.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He doesn't even get Sundays off.  Every day he's hostling.

The League of Explorers.name: Brann Bronzebeard
The League of Explorers.flavor: Contains 75% more fiber than his brother Magni!
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Desert Camel
The League of Explorers.text: Battlecry: Put a 1-Cost minion from each deck into the battlefield.
The League of Explorers.flavor: Dang.  This card is sweet.  Almost as sweet as Dessert Camel.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Fierce Monkey
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Forgotten Torch
The League of Explorers.text: Deal $3 damage. Shuffle a 'Roaring Torch' into your deck that deals 6 damage.
The League of Explorers.flavor: Why does a forgotten torch turn into a roaring torch with no provocation?  It's one of life's many mysteries.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked by starting the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Can be crafted after starting the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Mounted Raptor
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Mrgl Mrgl Nyah Nyah
The League of Explorers.text: Summon 5 Murlocs that died this game.

The League of Explorers.name: Unearthed Raptor
The League of Explorers.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its Deathrattle effect.
The League of Explorers.flavor: Still hunting for the ones who earthed him.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Addled Grizzly
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Druids who spend too long in bear form are more susceptible to the whispers of the Old Gods.  Right now they are whispering the lyrics to "La Bamba".

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Am'gam Rager
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: peerc rewop

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Blood Warriors
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Add a copy of each damaged friendly minion to your hand.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: They have an uneasy rivalry with the Blood Paladins.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Bloodsail Cultist
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: If you control another Pirate, give your weapon +1/+1.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: They're really just in it for the Blood Parrot.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Carrion Grub
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Carrion, my wayward grub.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Darkshire Councilman
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: After you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Democracy in action!

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Disciple of C'Thun
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: C’Thun’s recruiting pitch involves cookies, which is why it’s the most popular Old God.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Feral Rage
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Choose One - Give your hero +4 Attack this turn; or Gain 8 Armor.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Forlorn Stalker
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Give all Deathrattle minions in your hand +1/+1.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: He's going to leave the dying up to you, if that's cool.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Infest
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Beast to your hand."
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: The best part is the look on their face when you jump out of the cake! Err… corpse.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Rallying Blade
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to your minions with Divine Shield.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Ravaging Ghoul
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: But goes by "Ravishing Ghoul" when he hits the club.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Shadow Strike
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Deal $5 damage to an undamaged character.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: It's like a backstab, only from the front. And with two more stabs.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Silithid Swarmer
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Can only attack if your hero attacked this turn.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: If your hero doesn't attack, it's just "Silithid Loner".

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Spawn of N'Zoth
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Who's a cute widdle N'Zoth? You are! Yes you are! Yes you're the cutest widdle N'Zoth in the whole world!!!

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Spreading Madness
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Deal $9 damage randomly split among ALL characters.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Squirming Tentacle
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Yeah, I think we can agree that killing the squirming tentacle first is a good idea.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Steward of Darkshire
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it Divine Shield.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Turns out divine shields are way cheaper if you buy in bulk.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Twilight Elder
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: At the end of your turn, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Just doesn't understand those Twilight Youngsters any more - with their comic books and their rock music.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Twilight Flamecaller
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Make sure you summon a Twilight Marshmallowcaller too! Mmmm Mmm Mmm!!

Karazhan.text:

summon a random
minion of that Cost.
Lose 1 Durability.

Karazhan.name: Atiesh
Karazhan.text:
[x]After you cast a spell,
summon a random
minion of that Cost.
Lose 1 Durability.

Karazhan.name: Black Rook
Karazhan.text: Auto-Attack: Deal 2 damage to the enemies opposite this minion.

Karazhan.name: Cloaked Huntress
Karazhan.flavor: She's practically GIVING your secrets away!
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Deadly Fork
Karazhan.text: Deathrattle: Add a 3/2 weapon to your hand.
Karazhan.flavor: For a proper setting, place the deadly fork after the salad fork, but before the dinner fork.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Flame Wreath
Karazhan.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, deal 5 damage to all other enemies.

Karazhan.name: Flame Wreath
Karazhan.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, deal 10 damage to all other enemies.

Karazhan.name: Moroes
Karazhan.text: Stealth At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Steward.
Karazhan.flavor: Moroes runs an army of stewards, but still ends up inflating the balloons himself.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Nether Breath
Karazhan.text:
[x]Change the Health of
all enemy minions to 1.

Karazhan.name: Nightbane Templar
Karazhan.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 1/1 Whelps.
Karazhan.flavor: Originally joined to be Arcanagos’ Templar, but has to admit that ordering pizza has become waaaay easier.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Pantry Spider
Karazhan.flavor: You have to admit, they make a cute couple.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Pour a Round
Karazhan.text: Draw a card for each of your Plates.

Karazhan.name: Protect the King!
Karazhan.text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Pawn with Taunt.
Karazhan.flavor: Form ranks! Everyone into the King's Tuskarr Defense!
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
Karazhan.text: Deal $4 damage to three random enemies.

Karazhan.name: Silverware Golem
Karazhan.text: If you discard this minion, summon it.
Karazhan.flavor: From the secret research labs of the Swiss Army.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Terrifying Roar
Karazhan.text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.

Karazhan.name: Violet Illusionist
Karazhan.text: During your turn, your hero is Immune.
Karazhan.flavor: She’s much more cheerful after losing the ‘n’ in her name.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: White Rook
Karazhan.text: Auto-Attack: Deal 2 damage to the enemies opposite this minion.

Karazhan.name: Zoobot
Karazhan.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly Beast, Dragon, and Murloc +1/+1.
Karazhan.flavor: The Murloc is taking the picture.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Tavern Brawl.name: Core Hound Pup
Tavern Brawl.text: At the end of each turn, summon all Core Hound Pups that died this turn.

Tavern Brawl.name: Dragonscale Warrior
Tavern Brawl.text: Whenever any player targets this minion with a spell, that player draws a card.

Tavern Brawl.name: Heigan the Unclean
Tavern Brawl.text: At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to a  random enemy.

Tavern Brawl.name: High Justice Grimstone
Tavern Brawl.text: At the start of your turn, summon a Legendary minion.

Tavern Brawl.name: Living Bomb
Tavern Brawl.text: Choose an enemy minion. If it lives until your next turn, deal 5 damage to all enemies.

Tavern Brawl.name: OLDLegit Healer
Tavern Brawl.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random friendly minion that died this turn.

Tavern Brawl.name: OLDPvP Rogue
Tavern Brawl.text: Stealth Regain Stealth when PvP Rogue kills a minion.

Tavern Brawl.name: Spectral Gothik
Tavern Brawl.text: At the start of your turn, deal 4 damage to your hero.

Tavern Brawl.name: Swordsman
Tavern Brawl.text: Battlecry: Gain Attack and Health equal to Stormwind's Attack

Missions.name: Flame Burst
Missions.text: Shoot 5 missiles at random enemies for $1 damage each.

Credits.name: Ben Brode
Credits.text: Your volume can't be reduced below maximum.

Credits.name: Bob Fitch
Credits.text: Super Taunt (EVERY character must attack this minion.)

Credits.text: Choose One - Restore a Mech to full Health; or Give a Designer Windfury.

Credits.text: While this is in your hand, Golden cards cost (1) less.

Credits.name: Kyle Harrison
Credits.text: 3 for a 5/4? That's a good deal!
